3. Text: Henry V is a full-service communications agency specializing in live events and experience marketing.

--------------------
Text: Henry V Events:  Founded in 1978 as National Meeting Company Inc., the company – now known as Henry V – is the Northwest's oldest and largest experiential marketing agency.
Triplets:<Henry V

Text: Henry V Events:  Henry V is headquartered in Portland, Oregon.

<Text: Henry V Events:  The privately owned company has more than 30 full-time employees with a national network of more than 100 contract event professionals.>
